title: Surprise someone special with a refurbished MacBook Air for under $330
content:
Macworld

Someone among your nearest and dearest needs a laptop upgrade to a MacBook. You can not only satisfy their holiday wish, but you can do it affordably during our pre-Black Friday savings event. Now through November 16, you can get a refurbished 2017 MacBook Air for only $329.97 (reg. $1199).

Whether your giftee wants to get some serious work done or veg out and binge on K-dramas all day, this powerhouse laptop is more than up to the challenge.

Running on an Intel Core i5 processor for smooth, powerful operation and sporting features like WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity, a crisp 13.3” LED-backlit glossy widescreen display, and more, this pre-loved MacBook Air can juggle multitasking with ease. Enjoy the Intel HD Graphics 6000 for crystal-clear image and video rendering, a 720p FaceTime camera for family and work calls, and 128GB of local storage.

While this computer did have a past life, it’s been thoroughly inspected and tested, boasting a Grade B rating. Its exterior may have light scuffing or minor scratches, but its performance should be as good as new.

Treat yourself or a loved one to this refurbished 13.3″ MacBook Air with Intel Core i5 for just $329.97 until November 16 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon necessary!
